summary: A love story about a young man who runs away up an isolated Australian river and gets a job with eighth generation oyster famers.
cast: Alex O'Loughlin|Jim Norton|Diana Glenn|David Field|Kerry Armstrong|Claudia Harrison|Alan Cinis|Jack Thompson|Brady Kitchingham|Gary Henderson|Bill Wisely|Brian Howarth|Ian Johnson|Peter Johnson|Lloyd Spencer|Bob Yearley|Rodney Bateman|Kenneth Hill|David Cook|Sarah Smuts-Kennedy|Don Bridges|Craig Elliott|Natalie McCurry|Brendan Monger|Craig Weekes|Stuart Clarke|Reg Richards|Mick Duncan|Rob Cameron|Franc Violi|Gavin Wild|Brett Sheerin|Kelly Moxham|Julia Wilson|Ian Duncan|Lorna Bennet|Duncan|Shadow|Paul J. Mailath
title: Oyster Farmer
